Wait, the user wants the first appearance and a short character description. The cursor is set up to filter mentions of the professor. The key part is the phrase "кипел от негодования," which indicates his temper. 

Once the agent returns the first evidence item, I'll extract the relevant paragraph, note the pointer, and summarize his character traits based on the text.
